name: Army Transport Cargo Truck
description:
Army Transport Cargo Truck is the best realistic Army Truck game ever. Get ready for an adventurous free army base coach driving game. You are an offroad military transporter truck driver of a real military 18 wheeler truck loader.
FEATURES
Real Experience of Driving Army Cargo Truck
10 Exciting Game Play Missions
Smooth Steering & Brakes
Amazing 3D Graphics & Off Road Environment
